laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Nucleic acid amplification assay for C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Cepheid nucleic acid amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative)

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABDOMEN AND PELVIS WITH CONTRAST

findings.lungs: Bibasilar subsegmental atelectasis, otherwise within normal limits, no pleural or pericardial effusion.
findings.liver: Homogenous attenuation, no focal lesions or biliary dilatation.
findings.pancreas: Normal attenuation, no focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
findings.kidneys: Normal and symmetric size, several renal cysts, largest 3 cm, no suspicious lesions.
findings.gastrointestinal: Small hiatus hernia, distended small bowel loops, likely postoperative free air.
findings.pelvis: Small volume free fluid likely postoperative, nonhemorrhagic.
